I buy extra large because of the size of my chest.  I like the looser look.  These sweaters fit great and the long length come down past my rear end, which I look for. 评论概述: Upsize - not long enough & material is too thin
评论详情: I was so hopeful that I had found a nice long tunic I could wear with my leggings. I even upsized just to make sure I would have a looser fit and maybe add a little bit of length. Sadly, I was disappointed. The top is so soft and I absolutely love the pockets. The shoulder is flattering the way it's gathered. It adds a bit of feminine and dressy flair. Why was I disappointed? We'll, for starters I'm a 5'8 curvy girl - I've got hips - and I like my tops/tunics to fall long enough to cover my backside. I don't know how tall the model is but the tunic looks to fall about mid thigh on her. On my body it barely covered my backside. And even though I have sized it is definitely not flowy as it looks on the model. I normally wear a large or a size 12/14 in women's and I decided to order an extra large in this tunic. Also, the material is very, very thin. Not at all what I was expecting. It's yet another Amazon clothing fail and I will be returning the top.

I purchased this to wear with slim fitting pants. It fits perfect! I am between a size medium and large, opted for medium and am very happy I did. It has enough room to make it comfortable without being baggy. It's just the right length (I am 5'4" tall) It's super soft too.  I received several compliments. Will definitely buy it in more colors
Shoulder sleeves were not sewn in correctly. Returned the item.
Short, not long and loose fit like the Amazon pictures.  The material is thin and see through.  The pockets are not strong enough to hold a cell phone.
Nice length and great with leggings. Great for Florida winter. Sleeves are poofy, only issue I have.

The style is so flattering. This is my second purchase of this product. Like that the material isnt clingy, its soft, the weight isnt heavy but with a Turtle neck shirt it was great in the low 40° and a medium jacket. Without a cam it was comfortable in the higher 60s. It dresses up or down, can wear it with Jean leggings, A casual knit scarf or black leggings and jewelry. I'm 83 yo, 5'4", 200 lbs
